The video was fact: checked by performing a reverse image search via Google, which led to a fact-check report by a Pakistan-based news platform that confirmed the video was from Services Hospital in Lahore, not Osmania Hospital in Hyderabad.
Multiple requests were received to fact: check the viral video on various platforms, including the Alt News Android application and WhatsApp.
Media reports were found that confirmed: 4. The video was compared to a picture of Services Hospital, Lahore uploaded on Google Maps, and a collage showing the image comparison was created to further verify its authenticity.
